title: Guardian of the Harvest
description: Human beings were harvested to the point of extinction throughout the Galaxy. Revered as the most luxurious and cultured pet. We were sold throughout its expanse as companions and concubines. Our ancient hunters have now discovered Earth, threatening our very survival. A single one of us now stands against them. Taken by them, she fights to protect and guard us. They will force her to bend to their whim and aid in our destruction. From her gilded cage, she lives among them and fights to maintain her sanity. Searching for a way out and a way back home.This book series features action and adventure, immersion in an alien civilization, heavy erotic tones and sporadic eruptions of violence or brutality.RATED: XXX For parts that have heavy erotica or sex
author: Cornelius Moy
